name: Scriptuit Technologies
description:
We are a perfect mix of engineers when it comes to end-to-end delivery. Right from the inception stage of the product to its deployment stage.
Our engineers consists of a unique blend of developers + devops engineers. Prominent technical skills include: JEE, Scala / Play, AWS, NodeJS and AngularJS.
We have hands on experience in the major 2 technology stacks: JEE and MEAN stack.
We have worked with a range of startups as well as enterprises in the industry.
